description: This Dart file defines the AuthService class responsible for handling user authentication tasks such as registration, login, JWT storage, and token retrieval in a Flutter application. It interacts with a FastAPI backend via HTTP requests and manages JWT tokens securely using FlutterSecureStorage.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A utility class for user authentication, managing login, registration, JWT storage, and token management.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login with provided email and password, stores JWT token on success, and returns a success/failure message.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Attempts user registration with provided email and password, returning success or error message.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if a JWT token is stored, indicating user is authenticated.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes the stored JWT token, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: _setJwtToken
methods.description: Stores a JWT token securely in storage.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the JWT token from secure storage.
